resources.string: All stations of the one trip \"%s\"
Welcome to Helsinki Timetables!\n\n This wizard will help you to start using this application.
Firstly, you need to load the database with all Helsinki routes times. Please, select the way you prefer to download the data:

Automatically.
Let the application downloads database by itself.

Manually.
You may download the database by yourself and put it on the SD card.
Importing is finished successfully. You can continue using the application.
Import ends with errors. Importing failed.
You have chosen to import database automatically. \n

Application will download the database by itself. Please, make sure, that your phone is connected to the WiFi network or unlimited mobile internet, because database is quite big and downloading will cause the high network traffic.

You have chosen to import database manually.

It means, that you will download the file from site by yourself and will pull it to the SD card. Please, visit the

http://hsl.2rooms.net/download.html

and follow instructions.
Don\'t forget to use our widget!\n\n Firstly, you should create a new bookmarks before, then add it to your desktop.

Finished. 

 Now you may use the Helsinki Timetables application every day.

Good luck!

Wizard is finished. 

When you press button "Finish" the application will exit. Then you should to put the database file to the SD-card and on the next start up the application will perform it for you and then you may use it every day. 

Good luck!
Found database in folder \"hsl\". Please, wait while the application extracts the files. It may take some time.
Sorry, extracting process ended with error (fail during extract operation).
Sorry, extracting process ended with error (fail during file opening).
Set custom image, associated with this bookmark:
You still don\'t have any bookmarks. To add this, please, choose \"Add Bookmarks\" from menu or press the button below.
You don\'t have any bookmarks saved. Please go to the HSL application and create new one.
There are no trips for this bookmark at this moment.

Database is corrupted. This error may occur, if database was downloaded incorrectly or your SD-card is damaged. Try to manually remove database file and upload it to SD-card once again. Instruction you find here: \n\n http://hsl.2rooms.net/download.html
Can\'t retrieve the database information. Please check the Internet connection.
Warning! We do not recommend to download this database! Reason:\n%s \nTry to update it once again on the next week.
Do you want to delete the corrupted file from the SD-card?
You are going to interrupt the import. The downloaded file will be removed. Are you sure?
